title: San Miguel (California)
name: Mission San Miguel
hours: Museum open daily 10am-4:30pm. Church open daily 8am-5pm
content: Founded in 1797 by Father Lasuen as the 16th mission.  During secularization, it served as a dance hall after its owners were murdered.  Features an arcade of 12 arches of varying sizes.  Reopened in 2009 after suffering significant damage in a 2003 earthquake.  Still inhabited by Franciscan monks.
